mapper.select: SELECT * FROM itemcategory ORDER BY ino
mapper.sql: SELECT trade.tno, trade.ttitle, trade.tdate, trade.tread, trade.tauctionstate, trade.tauctionminbidunit, trade.tauctionstartprice, member.mnickname, itemcategory.ino, itemcategory.iname, COALESCE(auctionhistory.abidprice, 0) AS abidprice, COALESCE(auctionhistory.abidprice + trade.tauctionminbidunit, trade.tauctionstartprice) AS minbidprice FROM trade INNER JOIN member ON member.muuid = trade.muuid INNER JOIN itemcategory ON itemcategory.ino = trade.ino LEFT JOIN auctionhistory ON auctionhistory.tno = trade.tno AND auctionhistory.astate = 2 WHERE trade.ttype = 1
mapper.select: SELECT trade.tno, trade.ttitle, trade.tcontent, trade.tdate, trade.tread, trade.tauctionstate, trade.tauctionminbidunit, trade.tauctionstartprice, member.muuid, member.mnickname, itemcategory.ino, itemcategory.iname, COALESCE(auctionhistory.abidder, null) AS abidder, COALESCE(auctionhistory.abidprice, 0) AS abidprice FROM trade INNER JOIN member ON member.muuid = trade.muuid INNER JOIN itemcategory ON itemcategory.ino = trade.ino LEFT JOIN auctionhistory ON auctionhistory.tno = trade.tno AND auctionhistory.astate = 2 WHERE trade.ttype = 1 AND trade.tno = #{tno}

SELECT trade.tno, trade.tauctionstate, trade.tauctionminbidunit, trade.tauctionstartprice, member.mbalance, COALESCE(auctionhistory.ano, null) AS ano, COALESCE(auctionhistory.abidder, null) AS abidder, COALESCE(auctionhistory.abidprice, 0) AS abidprice FROM trade INNER JOIN member ON member.muuid = #{muuid} LEFT JOIN auctionhistory ON auctionhistory.tno = trade.tno AND auctionhistory.astate = 2 WHERE trade.ttype = 1 AND trade.tno = #{tno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auctionhistory (tno, abidder, abidprice, abidcharge) VALUES (#{tno}, #{muuid}, #{bidPrice}, #{bidPrice}*0.1)
